## Sealist
- A html based paper manager!
  Repository: <https://github.com/sehighs/sealist>  
  Zotero never worked properly on my machine from the moment I installed it, so
  —in a fit of DIY resolve (with a help from GPT-o3)—I just built my own. It’s simple and still evolving, but already sufficient for my personal workflow now. I’ll continue to improve it as time allows.
